parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.78

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> The Friendly side - friendly to all, see [[Side relations]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[sideFriendly]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[side]] [[player]] == [[sideFriendly]]) [[then]] { [[hint]] "I feel friendly today!"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Side]], [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideLogic]], [[sideUnknown]], [[sideEnemy]], [[playerSide]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[Side relations]]
</value></part></template>
